name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 37: The Stink Pile Sleep System

content.html:
Dear Internet, This week we are talking about freshly cracked pepper on everything, monitoring your coworkers, and sleeping in a big stink pile of clothing. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
